definition: (located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)
free and at leisure (idiom); unfettered/outside the reach of the law (of criminal)/at large
to ask for trouble/to bring misfortune on oneself
leisurely and free (idiom); carefree and at ease

sentences.english: The Maheshvara Heaven: Maheshvara is Sanskrit that means great ease.
sentences.chinese: 摩醯首罗天是梵语，翻成中文，就叫大自在天。

sentences.english: He seemed a little bit awkward when I talked to him.
sentences.chinese: 当我与他谈话时，他似乎有点不自在。

sentences.english: As a result, you feel out of place without a beverage in your hand .
sentences.chinese: 结果是，你觉得手中没酒就很不自在。

sentences.english: He was never at his ease with Frank.
sentences.chinese: 他跟弗兰克在一起总是感到很不自在。

sentences.english: I feel like a fish out of water among those high-society people.
sentences.chinese: 和那些上流社会的人在一起，我感到很不自在。
我从没感觉到这么自在过。

sentences.english: Then we relaxed and enjoyed our lunch to the sound of screeching sea birds and crashing waves.
sentences.chinese: 然后自在地在海鸟尖声鸣叫和拍浪声中享用午餐。

sentences.english: Why can't I fly like a bird in the blue sky?
sentences.chinese: 我为什么不能像小鸟一样在蓝天上自由自在地翱翔呢？

sentences.english: A long time ago, a man unencumbered own good uncomfortable.
sentences.chinese: 很久以前，自己一个人无牵无挂，好不自在。

sentences.english: Admire everyone's beauty freely, and drink in the perfume of Spirit that is all around you.
sentences.chinese: 自在的欣赏每一个人的美，饮下环绕著你的灵性芬芳。

sentences.english: She listens to here they spin a yarn, 1:00 doesn't feel uneasiness.
sentences.chinese: 她在这里听他们说故事，一点不觉得不自在。

sentences.english: As for those who remain pure & have self-respect, they are also worthy role models.
sentences.chinese: 而懂得洁身自在的人，也是值得我们学习的人。

sentences.english: Therefore this day and night rain, whether you care about, always thing-in-itself and song.
sentences.chinese: 因此这日夜雨，不论你是否在意，总是自在而歌。

sentences.english: A life of ease is a difficult pursuit.
sentences.chinese: 悠闲自在的生活，是一个难以追求的东西。

sentences.english: Perky little Nancy, prom queen sixty two years ago.
sentences.chinese: 消遥自在的小南希，62年前的舞会皇后。

sentences.english: My emotions continued to seesaw between pleasure and embarrassment.
sentences.chinese: 我的心情也依然在高兴与不自在之间摇摆不定。

definition: free and unconstrained (idiom); unfettered/unbuttoned/without care or worries
to fulfill one's desire/to find sth satisfactory
